description:
As a result of this change: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/22062/ nova has an unnecessary dependency on quantumclient.  This was not required before and there does not seem to be any compelling reason it should be now.  Checking openstack_driver.is_quantum_security_groups() before importing the quantum code should resolve this.

Attached is the traceback from trying to run nova without quantumclient.
title: Unnecessary dependency on quantumclient

comments.content:
